Sanitize Row Data

Source: R/sanitizeRowData.R
sanitizeRowData.Rd

Coerce gene annotations to DataFrame, and keep only atomic columns. Complex columns (e.g. Entrez ID list) will fail to write to disk as CSVs.

sanitizeRowData(object)

Arguments

object

Object.

Value

DataFrame. Contains only character and factor columns.

Note

Supports GRanges and DataFrame class objects.

Examples

data(rse)
from <- SummarizedExperiment::rowRanges(rse)
colnames(S4Vectors::mcols(from))
#> [1] "geneID"      "geneName"    "geneBiotype" "broadClass"  "entrezID"   
to <- sanitizeRowData(from)
vapply(to, is.atomic, logical(1L))
#>    seqnames       start         end       width      strand      geneID 
#>        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE 
#>    geneName geneBiotype  broadClass 
#>        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE 
print(to)
#> DataFrame with 500 rows and 9 columns
#>         seqnames     start       end     width   strand          geneID
#>         <factor> <integer> <integer> <integer> <factor>     <character>
#> gene001        X 100627109 100639991     12883        - ENSG00000000003
#> gene002        X 100584802 100599885     15084        + ENSG00000000005
#> gene003       20  50934867  50958555     23689        - ENSG00000000419
#> gene004        1 169849631 169894267     44637        - ENSG00000000457
#> gene005        1 169662007 169854080    192074        + ENSG00000000460
#> ...          ...       ...       ...       ...      ...             ...
#> gene496       13  20567069  20691437    124369        + ENSG00000032742
#> gene497       16   5033960   5087379     53420        + ENSG00000033011
#> gene498       12 122471600 122501073     29474        - ENSG00000033030
#> gene499        7 151212490 151227230     14741        - ENSG00000033050
#> gene500        7 151232489 151238827      6339        + ENSG00000033100
#>            geneName    geneBiotype  broadClass
#>         <character>    <character> <character>
#> gene001      TSPAN6 protein_coding      coding
#> gene002        TNMD protein_coding      coding
#> gene003        DPM1 protein_coding      coding
#> gene004       SCYL3 protein_coding      coding
#> gene005    C1orf112 protein_coding      coding
#> ...             ...            ...         ...
#> gene496       IFT88 protein_coding      coding
#> gene497        ALG1 protein_coding      coding
#> gene498      ZCCHC8 protein_coding      coding
#> gene499       ABCF2 protein_coding      coding
#> gene500       CHPF2 protein_coding      coding
